jd: From: Bhuvana, Hanker systems bhuvanan@hankersystems.com Reply to: bhuvanan@hankersystems.com Hi,Hope you're doing well.This is Bhuvana an Recruiter from Hanker Systems Please have a look at the below Job Description.Title: SAP S4 Project/Program Manager Location: Harrisburg-PA 9 Months+ Remote Key Responsibilities:Must be based in East or Central US time zones. Multi-organization, Brownfield conversion program to move from legacy ECC to S/4HANA. Project includes significant enhancements to existing SAP solutions. Project/Program Manager with S/4HANA experience and core PM skills in: Project Planning, Project Resource Management, Explore Workshop Management, Solution Support, Testing Oversight, Defect and Escalation Management. Build and maintain detailed project schedule, Resourcing, Issue/Risk management, Status Reporting, Coordinating with other teams including Technical and ECS, Support candidate vetting process to onboard SAP roles, Manage the on-time submission and approval of SOW Deliverables to the customer. Work collaboratively with Delivery Executives, customer Project Manager, Team Leads, and lead daily and weekly status meetings.Managed multiple S/4HANA Implementations, with an emphasis on Finance, Procurement, PS, PM, O2C.Managed large-scale, multi-organization implementationsActivate Methodology' experience.Has done Fit-to-Standard workshops. Managed Onsite/Offshore resources.Experience with Finance, Procurement, PS/PM, Sales and Manufacturing modules, is a plus. Experience writing and negotiating SOW's is a plus. Experience in a Fixed Fee project is a plus. Public Sector industry experience is a plus ( not a must ).Thank youbhuvanan@hankersystems.com
